def profitLoss(records):
    return round(sum(price - price / (1 + profit / 100) for (price, profit) in records), 2)

def profitLoss(records):
    return round(sum(pr * pe / (100+pe) for pr, pe in records), 2)

def profitLoss(records):
       
    return round(sum(amount * (1 - 1/(1 + perc/100)) for amount, perc in records), 2)

def profitLoss(records):
    return round(sum(price * percent / (100 + percent) for price, percent in records), 2)

def profitLoss(records):
    return round(sum(x * p / (100 + p) for x, p in records), 2)

def profitLoss(r):
    return round(sum( i[0]-i[0]*100./(100+i[1]) for i in r),2)

def profitLoss(records):
    return round(sum([r - (r / (1 + p / 100)) for r, p in records]), 2)

def profitLoss(records):
    return round(100 * (sum(c[0] - c[0]/(1+c[1]/100) for c in records)))/100

def profitLoss(records):
    return round(sum(map(lambda r: r[0] * r[1] / (100 + r[1]), records)), 2)
